short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Day Percent for better schedule your life. You can set the start time and end time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Day Percent is a simple Chrome extension that helps you stay on track by showing the percentage of the current time between the start and end time you set. Whether you are trying to manage your work schedule, stay focused on your study schedule or just want to be more productive in your day-to-day activities, Day Percent can help.

By setting the start and end time, the extension calculates the percentage of the current time between those two times and displays it as an icon on your Chrome browser. The percentage is updated every second to provide you with accurate real-time information. This way, you can easily monitor your progress throughout the day and stay on top of your tasks.

With Day Percent, you can easily keep track of your progress, manage your time more efficiently, and achieve your goals. It's a simple yet effective tool that can help you stay focused and productive all day long. So why not install Day Percent today and start making the most of your time?
